A version of '''[[Minecraft Infdev]]''' was released on '''April 15, 2010'''.<ref>[[wordofnotch:522979105|(too many) Monsters in infdev and further reports]] – The Word of Notch, April 15, 2010</ref>

== Changes ==
=== Mobs ===
'''General'''
* [[Mob]]s now spawn naturally.
* Most [[entities]] are now saved on reboot.
** But the [[arrows]] fired are not saved.

'''[[File:Zombie JE1.png|120px]] [[Giant]]s'''
* Texture changed from [[File:Steve JE3 BE1.png|100px]].

=== General ===
'''General'''
* Custom skins now work again.
** However, the player's skin is always black unless the player uses a proxy debugger or some arguments.

== Fixes ==
'''1 bug fixed'''
* Fixed some broken [[lighting]] code.
** Lighting is now updated properly.
** Memory consumption has been reduced.
** [[Block]]s not exposed to [[the sky]] when generated (such as cliff overhangs) are no longer completely dark.
